unnormalised: Smart meters, eh? Sounds like something straight outta Bangalore's tech parks!
normalised: Smart meters, eh? Sounds like something straight out of Bangalore's tech parks!

unnormalised: Hope they actually *work* properly this time. Remember the last "upgrade" by BESCOM? Total mess!
normalised: Hope they actually work properly this time. Remember the last "upgrade" by B E S C O M? Total mess!

unnormalised: Will these things spike up the bill during Onam celebrations when everyone's cooking up a storm of sadhya?
normalised: Will these things spike up the bill during Onam celebrations when everyone's cooking up a storm of sadhya?

unnormalised: Heard some are saying it helps save energy, like eating biryani with a spoon – slow and steady!
normalised: Heard some are saying it helps save energy, like eating biryani with a spoon – slow and steady!

unnormalised: If it reduces power cuts, especially in Chennai summers, I'm all for it.
normalised: If it reduces power cuts, especially in Chennai summers, I am all for it.

unnormalised: But if it's just another way to charge extra, no thanks!
normalised: But if it is just another way to charge extra, no thanks!

unnormalised: Rs. 5000 for installation? Seems a bit steep, ya.
normalised: Rupees five thousand for installation? Seems a bit steep, ya.

unnormalised: Let's hope it's better than the meter-readers who always round up our usage.
normalised: Let us hope it is better than the meter-readers who always round up our usage.
